en: Deliver me from mine enemies, O my God: Set me on high from them that rise up against me.
hmr: Aw Pathien, a mi dotuhaia inthawk hin mi sanhim la, A mi thawtuhaia inthawk hin hmun insângah mi dâwmkai rawh.

en: Deliver me from the workers of iniquity, And save me from the bloodthirsty men.
hmr: Thil suksuoltuhai laia inthawkin mi sanhim la, Thisen insuo hmanghaia inthawkin mi sandam rawh.

en: For, lo, they lie in wait for my soul; The mighty gather themselves together against me: Not for my transgression, nor for my sin, O Jehovah.
hmr: Aw LALPA, ka bawsietna lei ni loin, ka suol lei khawm ni bawk loin, Ngai ta, ka hringna hi an inchân zing sih a, Mi hrâthai chu a mi thaw dingin an pungkhâwm a nih.

en: They run and prepare themselves without my fault: Awake thou to help me, and behold.
hmr: Ka suol naw sa khawmin an tlân a, an inbuotsai a, Mi ṭhangpui dingin insukhar la, en rawh.

en: Even thou, O Jehovah God of hosts, the God of Israel, Arise to visit all the nations: Be not merciful to any wicked transgressors. [Selah
hmr: Aw LALPA, sipaihairawi Pathien, Israelhai Pathien, Nangma ngei chu hnam tinrêng sir dingin tho la, Mi vervêk suoltakhai chu lunginsiet hrim hrim naw.

en: They return at evening, they howl like a dog, And go round about the city.
hmr: Zântieng an hung nawk a, ui angin an khêk veng vung a, Khawpui chu an hêl an hêl a.

en: Behold, they belch out with their mouth; Swords are in their lips: For who, say they, doth hear?
hmr: Ngai ta, an bauah an inir suok a, An hmûra chun kâwlhnâmhai a um a: “Tu am hrie an um a?” an ti el a nih.

en: But thou, O Jehovah, wilt laugh at them; Thou wilt have all the nations in derision.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, aw LALPA, nangin anni chu nuisan lem i ta; Hnam tinrêng chu nuiêu i tih.

en: Because of his strength I will give heed unto thee; For God is my high tower.
hmr: Aw ka hrâtna, nghâk zing ka ti che. Pathien chu ka kulbîng insâng a ni sih a.

en: My God with his lovingkindness will meet me: God will let me see my desire upon mine enemies.
hmr: Ka chunga ngilnei Pathien chun mi tuok a ta, Pathienin ka hmêlmahai chunga ka duthusâm chu mîn hmutir a tih.

en: Slay them not, lest my people forget: Scatter them by thy power, and bring them down, O Lord our shield.
hmr: Anni chu that naw la, chuong naw chun, ka mihaiin theinghil rawi an tih; Aw LALPA, kan phaw tak, I thilthawtheinain sukdar la, suktlâwm rawh.

en: For the sin of their mouth, and the words of their lips, Let them even be taken in their pride, And for cursing and lying which they speak.
hmr: An baua suolna lei le, an hmûra thu suok leiin, An chapona ngeia chun âwk raw se: An thu hril hlak, ṭawngseinphurna le khêlthu lei khawmin.

en: Consume them in wrath, consume them, so that they shall be no more: And let them know that God ruleth in Jacob, Unto the ends of the earth. [Selah
hmr: Annirawi chu lunginsenin sukbohmang la, an um ta nawna dingin sukbohmang rawh, Pathienin Jakobrawi chungah ro a rêl ti hre tâwl raw hai seh, Leihnuoi tâwp chenin.

en: And at evening let them return, let them howl like a dog, And go round about the city.
hmr: Chun, zântieng hung nâwk hai sienla, ui angin khêk veng vung hai sien, Khawpui chu hêl hêl raw hai seh.

en: They shall wander up and down for food, And tarry all night if they be not satisfied.
hmr: Anni chu fâkding zawngin invâk an ta, An khawp naw chun zânkhawvârin um an tih.

en: But I will sing of thy strength; Yea, I will sing aloud of thy lovingkindness in the morning: For thou hast been my high tower, And a refuge in the day of my distress.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, kei chun i hrâtna thu hi hlain sak ka ta, Anih, zîngkâr chun i ngilneina thu hi hlimtakin hlain sak ka tih: Nang chu ka kulbîng insâng, Ka lunginzîng nia kân humhimna i ni si hlak a.

en: Unto thee, O my strength, will I sing praises: For God is my high tower, the God of my mercy.
hmr: Aw ka hrâtna, nangma inpâkna hla sak ka tih. Pathien chu ka kulbîng insâng, ka chunga ngilnei Pathien chu a ni sih a.
